Divine Institute of New Evangelization


Find Out More

Then I said, "Here am I. Send me!""

Isaiah 6:8

Want to know more?

What is DINE?

A 14 Day Residential International Catholic School of Mission in Ramsgate, Kent, UK with speakers from around the world.

Who should attend?

Anyone aged between 18 and 35yrs
Excited about the Catholic Faith
Wants to serve the Lord in Ministry
Looking for a cross-cultural exposure

What to expect?

A divine experience, where you get to encounter God, and learn the tools you need to tell more people about God's love, and how it can change their lives.

Come Join Us!


Interested to participate in DINE 2020?

DINE 2020

---------------

Dates: Jul 26th - Aug 9th

Venue: Divine Retreat Center, UK

Cost: 250 £ (Full Board)


..the most precious part for me is.. seeing the families who came from different countries.. for ONE MISSION, ONE HEART and ONE MIND and it made me realise that missionary can be done in a family context and.. will work in God’s Grace.

Agnes, Malaysia

“... God didn’t forget about me especially during personal prayer time.. He calls me to.. fight for His people through His love.. He spoke to me about some strategies to approach and reach out to.. care for His people.”

Janka, Slovakia

..there was a burning love in my heart.. but not enough.. to give to anyone. That’s when I heard about DINE, I accepted it.. We were taught to show love.. Now, the amount of fire I have inside cannot be contained...

Mario, Germany

We’ve got to meet so many spirit filled, talented people. We learnt so many things about ministry and evangelisation.. and literally see Jesus changing lives.. It’s really helped me personally develop new skills and gifts in my own music ministry.

Shando, Germany

..on [outreach].. when I saw this man.. this emotion of him just transferred through his eyes to my eye.. My partner and I prayed and felt the sadness.. and for sure, God has already planted a seed inside his heart!...

Leon, Germany

I met twelve different nations.. with the same heart, mind and desire to take God to this beautiful world.. and to these people that’s so desperate in search for.. God.. to fulfil their hearts and my heart as well.

Jessica, Brazil

..this opportunity made me walk the talk! I went out spoke to people that were quite intimidating.. Speaking to them, I learnt that there are so many people suffering (inside) and if we don’t go and help them then who will?

Darren, United Kingdom
